8-0_training_50_0:
SELECT MIN(an.name) AS actress_pseudonym, MIN(t.title) AS japanese_movie_dubbed
FROM cat_aka_name_1 AS an,
 cat_cast_info_1 AS ci,
 cat_company_name_1 AS cn,
 cat_movie_companies_1 AS mc,
 cat_name_1 AS n,
 cat_role_type_1 AS rt,
 cat_title_1 AS t
WHERE an.person_id = n.id
 AND n.id = ci.person_id
 AND ci.movie_id = t.id
 AND t.id = mc.movie_id
 AND mc.company_id = cn.id
 AND ci.role_id = rt.id
 AND an.person_id = ci.person_id
 AND ci.movie_id = mc.movie_id
AND ci.note = '(executive producer)'
AND cn.country_code = '[de]'
AND mc.note LIKE '%)%'
AND mc.note NOT LIKE '%l%'
AND n.name LIKE '%e%'
AND n.name NOT LIKE '%K%'
AND rt.role = 'producer';
